body:
Overhaul hpctoolkit to AutotoolsPackage and to build its dependencies
directly from spack instead of using hpctoolkit-externals.

Remove hpctoolkit-externals since it's no longer needed.

--------------------------------------------------

This version should build and run everywhere the previous version
built.  It should run better due to using recent dyninst 10.0.

Probably neither will build on Cray due to spack's confusion of
front-end and back-end compilers as in issue #9613.  I don't even know
if there is a recipe that would build toolkit on Cray without some
tweaks inside spack.

Anyway, I'd prefer to update this now, get it into an all-spack build,
and then work on what's needed for Cray and Blue Gene.

ping @pramodskumbhar who wrote the previous recipe.  Maybe you'd like
to try it out, let me know if it works for your use case.

ping @scheibelp for review
title: hpctoolkit: overhaul to use spack dependencies
